dublin_core.dcvalue: We examined the frequency of adolescents use of electronic media ie television movie watching text messaging talking on the telephone listening to music with headphones and playing with hand held games at family meals and examined associations with demographic characteristics rules about media use family characteristics and the types of foods served at meals using an observational cross sectional design Data were drawn from two coordinated population based studies of adolescents Project Eating Among Teens 2010 and their parents Project Families and Eating Among Teens Surveys were completed during 2009 2010 Frequent television movie watching during family meals by youth was reported by 25 5 of parents Multivariate logistic regression analyses indicated significantly higher odds of mealtime media use PUnder0 05 for girls and older teens In addition higher odds of mealtime media use PUnder0 05 were also seen among those whose parents had low education levels or were black or Asian having parental rules about media use significantly reduced these odds Frequent mealtime media use was significantly associated with lower scores on family communication PUnder0 05 and scores indicating less importance placed on mealtimes PUnder0 001 Furthermore frequent mealtime media use was associated with lower odds of serving green salad fruit vegetables 100 juice and milk at meals whereas higher odds were seen for serving sugar sweetened beverages PUnder0 05 The ubiquitous use of mealtime media by adolescents and differences by sex race ethnicity age and parental rules suggest that supporting parents in their efforts to initiate and follow through on setting mealtime media use rules may be an important public health strategy
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-07T10:43:20Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2014-06-24
Journal of the Academy of Nutrition and Dietetics
Time 2 tlk 2nite: use of electronic media by adolescents during family meals and associations with demographic characteristics, family characteristics, and foods served.
